item.title: Bolero ‘Accident’ Turns Out to Be Murder: Gadwal Police Arrest 10
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: The Jogulamba Gadwal police have cracked a sensational contract killing case, arresting ten members of a supari gang involved in the murder of former sarpanch Boya Chinna Bhimarayudu. District SP T. Srinivasa Rao revealed the details during a press meet on Thursday, confirming that the accused had tried to portray the murder as a road accident.
The incident took place on November 21, 2025, when the victim was returning to Nandinne village from Gadwal on his motorcycle. Near Jampalli Bus...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh, Live Updates, Big Story

item.title: Veeresh Sagara to Lead Jogulamba Gadwal Sagara Sangham in Local Polls.
item.description:
<![CDATA[Jogulamba Gadwal District: In a significant development ahead of the upcoming local body elections, the prestigious Jogulamba Gadwal District Sagara Sangham has officially appointed M. Veeresh Sagara as its new Chairman. This key decision marks the beginning of a strong and strategic push by the Sagara community to ensure notable success in the forthcoming elections.
According to representatives of the Sagara Sangham, the appointment of Veeresh Sagara is aimed at strengthening community unity, ...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh, Live Updates, Big Story
